means.word_mean: 1. a communist state in Indochina on the South China Sea; achieved independence from France in 1945
2. a prolonged war (1954-1975) between the communist armies of North Vietnam who were supported by the Chinese and the non-communist armies of South Vietnam who were supported by the United States
